ClientId.description: The ID of the client associated with the user pool.

ConfirmationCode.description: The confirmation code sent by a user's request to retrieve a forgotten password.

Password.description: The password sent by sent by a user's request to retrieve a forgotten password.

SecretHash.description: A keyed-hash message authentication code (HMAC) calculated using the secret key of a user pool client and username plus the client ID in the message.

Username.description: The user name of the user for whom you want to enter a code to retrieve a forgotten password.
